slide-1.title: Quality will never disappoints
slide-1.subtitle: Here are our product and package list that comes with its price. You can also consult with us directly to find out more.

bespoke-service-section.title: Bespoke Suit Service
bespoke-service-section.subtitle: We measure and make suit patterns from scratch and just for you. Each suit pattern and structure is made exclusively and is different for each individual, producing a suit size that fits your body so you can look more optimally and confidently. The price we offer includes a suit, pants, and fabric.

card-1.description: Hi-Twist material is formed from polyester fibers that have a coarse texture, tend to be thicker and more rigid.

card-2.description: Linen material is formed from polyester fibers that have a coarse texture, tend to be thinner and more flexible.

card-3.description: Blends of Wool with other materials such as Cashmere, Polyester, Silk, and others. The thickness varies in each type.

card-4.description: This material contains more than 90% Wool, are relatively thicker than other materials and have a coarse texture.

shirt-collection-section.title: Shirt Collection
shirt-collection-section.subtitle: Complete your look by wearing our latest shirt collection. Be yourself by customizing your shirt the way you like it.

card-1.description: Made from 2 Way Stretch Cotton Fabric. Customizeable features: Collar, Cuffs, and Pocket.

card-2.description: Made from Toyobo Fabrics, suitable for daily use. Customizeable features: Collar, Cuffs, and Pocket
card-2.available: Available in White, Grey, Black, Navy, Maroon

pants-collection-section.title: Pants Collection
pants-collection-section.subtitle: Be different and stay on top of your looks wearing our latest pants collection.

card-1.description: Made from Semi Wool Fabrics, very comfortable yet suitable for any occassions.
card-1.available: Available in White and Dark Grey

wedding-package-section.title: Looking for a suit for your best day?
wedding-package-section.subtitle: Get the best look on your wedding day, and save more with the Wedding Package!
